entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kluane Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:02 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -7.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burwash Airport 4:35 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -7.4°C
Pressure: 100.9 kPa
Visibility: 2.4 km
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.5°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 24 February 2023
